Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Kenmore
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Wilson (Red Line), Sheridan and Lawrence due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrencebuses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wilson (Red Line), Sheridan and Lawrence due to, street blockage, near Lawrence/Kenmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to a door problem on a train. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
